languages.text: "Ни разу не нарекал я себя праведником. За моей душой много деяний, которые не дают мне сего сделать". {n}Проповедник крепко задумывается. Брови его хмурятся, а губы подрагивают.{/n} "Быть может, оттого я и временю с тем, чтобы явиться пред Инцендией? Быть может ты... прав{mf||а}?"

"Never once have I called myself a righteous man. My soul is burdened with many past deeds that prevent me from doing that." {n}The preacher thinks long and hard. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"
languages.original_text: "Ни разу не нарекал я себя праведником. За моей душой много деяний, которые не дают мне сего сделать". {n}Проповедник крепко задумывается. Брови его хмурятся, а губы подрагивают.{/n} "Быть может, оттого я и временю с тем, чтобы явиться пред Инцендией? Быть может ты... прав{mf||а}?"

He frowns and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"

"Never once have I called myself a righteous man. My soul is burdened with many past deeds that prevent me from doing that." {n}The preacher thinks long and hard. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"

languages.text: “我从来没有自称过正义之人。我的灵魂被过去的许多罪行所累，我没办法面对她。”{n}牧师陷入了沉思之中。他皱起眉头，嘴唇抽搐着。{/n}“或许这就是为什么我一直拖着不肯去见因森蒂娅？或许你……说得没错？”
languages.original_text: "Never once have I called myself a righteous man. My soul is burdened with many past deeds that prevent me from doing that." {n}The preacher thinks long and hard. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"

traits.locale_text: “我从来没有自称过正义之人。我的灵魂被过去的许多罪行所累，我没办法面对她。”{n}牧师陷入了沉思之中。他皱起眉头，嘴唇抽搐着。{/n}“或许这就是为什么我一直拖着不肯去见因森蒂娅？或许你……说得没错？”

languages.text: 「自分を正義の人間だと称した事はない。私の魂は様々な過去の行いで重荷を負っている。そんな風に称することなどできない」{n}プリーチャーは長い間深く考え込んだ。眉を顰め、唇をピクピクさせる。{/n}「もしかすると、それこそがインセンディアと対峙する時を待っている理由なのかもしれない。おそらく…正しかったのかもしれないな？」
languages.original_text: "Never once have I called myself a righteous man. My soul is burdened with many past deeds that prevent me from doing that." {n}The preacher thinks long and hard. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"

traits.locale_text: 「自分を正義の人間だと称した事はない。私の魂は様々な過去の行いで重荷を負っている。そんな風に称することなどできない」{n}プリーチャーは長い間深く考え込んだ。眉を顰め、唇をピクピクさせる。{/n}「もしかすると、それこそがインセンディアと対峙する時を待っている理由なのかもしれない。おそらく…正しかったのかもしれないな？」

languages.text: «Ni una sola vez me considerado un hombre justo. Mi alma lleva consigo una gran cantidad de hechos del pasado que me lo impiden». {n}El predicador piensa largo y tendido. Frunce el ceño y sus labios se mueven.{/n} «¿Quizás sea esa la razón por la que estoy esperando mi momento antes de enfrentarme a Incendia? Puede que tenga... razón».
languages.original_text: "Never once have I called myself a righteous man. My soul is burdened with many past deeds that prevent me from doing that." {n}The preacher thinks long and hard. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"

traits.locale_text: «Ni una sola vez me considerado un hombre justo. Mi alma lleva consigo una gran cantidad de hechos del pasado que me lo impiden». {n}El predicador piensa largo y tendido. Frunce el ceño y sus labios se mueven.{/n} «¿Quizás sea esa la razón por la que estoy esperando mi momento antes de enfrentarme a Incendia? Puede que tenga... razón».

languages.text: "Noch nie habe ich mich einen rechtschaffenen Mann genannt. Meine Seele ist mit vielen vergangenen Taten belastet, die mich daran hindern." {n}Der Prediger denkt lange und angestrengt nach. Er runzelt die Stirn und seine Lippen zucken.{/n} "Vielleicht ist das der Grund, warum ich mir Zeit lasse, bevor ich Incendia gegenübertrete? Vielleicht ... habt Ihr recht?"
languages.original_text: "Never once have I called myself a righteous man. My soul is burdened with many past deeds that prevent me from doing that." {n}The preacher thinks long and hard. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"

traits.locale_text: "Noch nie habe ich mich einen rechtschaffenen Mann genannt. Meine Seele ist mit vielen vergangenen Taten belastet, die mich daran hindern." {n}Der Prediger denkt lange und angestrengt nach. Er runzelt die Stirn und seine Lippen zucken.{/n} "Vielleicht ist das der Grund, warum ich mir Zeit lasse, bevor ich Incendia gegenübertrete? Vielleicht ... habt Ihr recht?"

languages.text: « Je ne me suis jamais considéré comme quelqu'un de droit. Par le passé, j'ai commis des péchés qui pèsent bien trop lourd sur mon âme pour me risquer à le croire. » {n}Le prêcheur se plonge dans une intense réflexion, puis il fronce les sourcils, les lèvres tremblantes.{/n} « C'est peut-être la raison pour laquelle je repousse sans arrêt le moment d'affronter Incendia... Oui... Peut-être avez-vous... raison... ? »
languages.original_text: "Never once have I called myself a righteous man. My soul is burdened with many past deeds that prevent me from doing that." {n}The preacher thinks long and hard. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne me suis jamais considéré comme quelqu'un de droit. Par le passé, j'ai commis des péchés qui pèsent bien trop lourd sur mon âme pour me risquer à le croire. » {n}Le prêcheur se plonge dans une intense réflexion, puis il fronce les sourcils, les lèvres tremblantes.{/n} « C'est peut-être la raison pour laquelle je repousse sans arrêt le moment d'affronter Incendia... Oui... Peut-être avez-vous... raison... ? »

languages.text: "Erdemli bir adam olduğumu bir kez olsun iddia etmedim. Ruhum; beni bunu yapmaktan alıkoyan, geçmişteki sayısız hatanın yükünü taşıyor." {n}Vaiz, uzun uzadıya düşünüyor. Kaşlarını çatıyor ve dudakları seğiriyor.{/n} "Belki de İncendia'yla yüzleşmeyi ertelememin sebebi budur. Belki de... Haklısındır."
languages.original_text: "Never once have I called myself a righteous man. My soul is burdened with many past deeds that prevent me from doing that." {n}The preacher thinks long and hard. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "Perhaps that is the reason I am biding my time before facing Incendia? Perhaps you... are right?"

traits.locale_text: "Kendimin dosdoğru bir adam olduğunu bir kez olsun iddia etmedim. Ruhum, beni bunu yapmaktan alıkoyan, geçmişteki sayısız hatanın yükünü taşıyor." {n}Vaiz uzun uzun, derin derin düşünüyor. Kaşlarını çatıyor ve dudakları seğiriyor.{/n} "Belki de İncendia'yla yüzleşmeyi ertelememin sebebi budur? Belki de... Haklısındır?"
